title: My PBE client turned into a normal client and its trying to downgrade from 7.21
body: how do i fixed this problem, i don't want to download it all over again since i have terrible wifi and it will take a day again.

replies.body: Are you sure you didn't just accidentally open the normal League client? The PBE server has it's own unique client, so you'll need to find and open that one to hop on the PBE servers. Shoot me a screenshot of the client you're using if you don't think this is the problem.

I have had the same issue, when I click on my PBE client (and yes I made sure it was the PBE client) it gave me this message http://puu.sh/yismX/461f776f1b.jpg and all seemed well tell I clicked on the button on the next page http://puu.sh/yisvz/6c4b1feff5.jpg when I hit the download the game button I walked away and let it download but when I came back I realized it was a second normal client! Please help I have no idea whats going on here xD
if you have bad wifi I wouldn't recommend even playing on the PBE. the servers are not as good as the servers on the actual game
